statements: SELECT * FROM product_traceability
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, manufacturing_date FROM product_traceability
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product_traceability WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT manufacturer, expiry_date, location FROM product_traceability ORDER BY expiry_date DESC
SELECT * FROM product_traceability WHERE location = 'Warehouse A'
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, manufacturing_date, expiry_date FROM product_traceability WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, location FROM product_traceability WHERE batch_number LIKE 'B%' AND traceability_code = 'ABC123'
SELECT * FROM product_traceability WHERE manufacturing_date < '2022-01-01' AND location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT product_name, batch_number, quantity FROM product_traceability WHERE expiry_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT manufacturer, manufacturing_date, location FROM product_traceability WHERE traceability_code LIKE '%XYZ%' ORDER BY location DESC, manufacturing_date ASC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer, production_date FROM products;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date, manufacturer FROM products WHERE expiration_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, production_date, serial_number FROM products ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer FROM products WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple' AND production_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, expiration_date FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer, production_date, expiration_date FROM products WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer, production_date FROM products WHERE manufacturer LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY production_date DESC;

SELECT p.product_name, pl.event_type, pl.event_description, pl.event_timestamp FROM products p INNER JOIN product_logs pl ON p.product_id = pl.product_id WHERE p.product_id = 2 ORDER BY pl.event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer_name FROM products WHERE manufacturing_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, location_name, quantity FROM products JOIN product_locations ON products.product_id = product_locations.product_id;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, manufacturing_date, expiration_date FROM products WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, date_time FROM products JOIN product_tracking ON products.product_id = product_tracking.product_id WHERE location_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name FROM products WHERE manufacturing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, location_name, quantity FROM products JOIN product_locations ON products.product_id = product_locations.product_id WHERE location_name = 'Warehouse';

SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, date_time FROM products JOIN product_tracking ON products.product_id = product_tracking.product_id WHERE date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(tracking_id) AS tracking_count FROM product_tracking GROUP BY product_id HAVING tracking_count > 10 ORDER BY tracking_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Order;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, production_date FROM Product;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email, address FROM Supplier;
SELECT product_name, batch_number FROM Product ORDER BY batch_number DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_phone FROM Supplier ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Product ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, production_date FROM Product WHERE batch_number > 1000;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM Supplier WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_date, carrier_name FROM Shipment ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, supplier_id, quantity FROM Order WHERE quantity >= 50;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer FROM Product WHERE batch_number = 12345;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT warehouse_id, location, capacity FROM Warehouse ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM Employee WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE manufacturer='Apple' ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, batch_number, expiration_date FROM Product WHERE manufacturing_date>'2022-01-01';

SELECT p.product_name, s.location, sh.quantity FROM Product p JOIN Shipment sh ON p.product_id = sh.product_id JOIN Warehouse s ON sh.warehouse_id = s.warehouse_id WHERE sh.quantity>100 ORDER BY sh.quantity DESC;

SELECT s.supplier_name, s.contact_person, p.product_name, sh.shipment_date FROM Supplier s JOIN Shipment sh ON s.supplier_id = sh.supplier_id JOIN Product p ON sh.product_id = p.product_id WHERE sh.shipment_date<'2022-06-01' ORDER BY sh.shipment_date ASC;
SELECT e.employee_name, e.job_title, e.salary, w.location FROM Employee e JOIN Warehouse w ON e.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id WHERE e.salary>50000;
